sentences.en: A customer took a perfectly serviceable washing machine in for repair, only to be told it needed replacing.
sentences.cn: 一位顾客带着一台性能尚好的洗衣机来修，不料竟被告知该换洗衣机了。

sentences.en: Any lack of maintenance in serviceable parts.
Cleverness is serviceable for everything, sufficient for nothing.
sentences.cn: 聪明而不足以成事,只能叫做小聪明,聪明而能够成事, 才能叫做大智慧.

sentences.en: I have an old but serviceable Apple eMac that I would like to give to charity.
sentences.cn: 我有一台虽然老旧但仍然能用的苹果(Apple) eMac电脑,我想把它捐献给慈善机构.

sentences.en: It is in fact quite serviceable for seiches of an appreciable magnitude and short period.
sentences.cn: 但事实上它对量值大而周期短的假潮还颇适用.
这是个十分好用的公式.

sentences.en: Quotation a serviceable substitute for wit.
sentences.cn: 格言是智慧耐用的替代品.

sentences.en: Some drying equipment for cream material and their features, property and serviceable range were introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了几种用于干燥膏糊状物料的干燥设备,总结了各种干燥设备的特性 、 性能及适用范围.

sentences.en: Some of these old tools are still serviceable.
sentences.cn: 这些旧工具有些仍可使用。

sentences.en: The carpet is worn but still serviceable.
The coat is made of a serviceable fabric.
sentences.cn: 这件外套是用一种耐用的织物做的.

sentences.en: The tyres are worn but still serviceable.
sentences.cn: 这些轮胎已磨损,但尚可用.

sentences.en: The well - equipped kitchen, open, spacious, and serviceable.
sentences.cn: 开放式的厨房设计宽敞、设备齐全, 而且更增添了实用性.

sentences.en: This product contains no user serviceable parts.
sentences.cn: 本产品不含用户可维修零件.

sentences.en: When this building is repaired, it will be serviceable.
sentences.cn: 这栋楼房修好后还可以住.

words.tran_cn: 服务性的；耐用的；服现役的
可用性，适用性；使用可靠性；[计] 可服务性；可维修性
服役，服务；适合，足够；发球；招待，侍候
招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用
有用的，可供使用的；耐用的

trans.tran_cn: 有用的，可供使用的，耐用的
trans.tran_en: ready or able to be used
